string.text: Get Next Task
Receive your next task.
There is a contact who is willing to pay well for our services. Go see him.
Good luck stalker.
Commando Raid
You must stealthily infiltrate an enemy camp. The time of execution is 24 hours.

I have a job for you. Some group has settled where it doesn't belong, and must be destroyed. You have to go alone. They're expecting a big attack, but not a single scout. Clean up the camp quietly and eliminate them. I'll give you 24 hours to do it.
Well done. Our client is pleased. He even kicked in a bonus for you.
Assault the Bandit Camp
Lead a squad of Mercenaries in a raid on a Army camp. The time of execution is 12 hours.
Okay, so the military started some kind of unpleasant expansion. We need to show them where they belong. Take a few fighters and calm them down forever, you've got 12 hours for everything.
Well done, I'm happy. Yours well-deserved:
Get Next Task
Receive your next task.
I have a customer for you. I've marked his location on your map.
Good luck stalker.
Ambush Raid
Join a group of mercenaries about to set up an ambush. Run time is four hours.

So, several of our fighters have spotted an enemy camp in the area and are going to ambush. They said on the radio they're gonna need backup, get out there now before it's too late, you got four hours tops.
Great job. Here's your cut.
Extract Mercenary Prisoner
Release the prisoner mercenary. The time of execution is 24 hours.

Just recently, one of our specialists was caught on a mission. Now he's being held hostage, and just think of the ransom demands from us mercenaries. Unbelievable brazenness. Punish them and save our fighter, you've got no more than 24 hours.
Good work. No man left behind.
%s for Hog
%s - kill the mutant and bring Hog that trophy. It's a 3-day runtime.
You're good with mutants, aren't you? There's a couple of things that need to be cleaned up.

Just last week, I was attacked by a mutant. That scar from him will remain with me for life. If you see that damn thing, kill it and gut it. I'll reward you well, but don't take too long, I'll give you three days.
You killed it! Great! Take that you little fuck! Thanks man, you've done well.
Pay Dushman Mercenary Initiation Fee
Pay Dushman the 12,000 UAH fee to join the Mercenaries.
Ok, fine. The fee is 12,000 UAH, you bring your own weapons, no spitting on the floor. Sound good?
Welcome aboard, Mercenary.
Contract Killing for Dushman
The target must be found and eliminated. The execution time is 24 hours.

Our employer gave us a new order list the other day, and someone needs to clean it up. These are hard times - fighters are few, there are a lot of tasks, and the work has to be done. We do not want to lose the trust of our customers, right? Anyway, your job is to find and kill one type, no matter who he is. If you're interested, I'll drop the details on your PDA. You need to do it in the shortest possible time, the maximum you have - a day.
Is it done? Oh, great. Here's your share:
Assault Enemy Territory for Dushman
Clear the area from any hostile elements. Run time is 24 hours.

We've got a new employer who wants to pinch someone. So I'll show you the area in the PDA that needs to be cleared as much as possible and you do it, but don't drag it out for more than 24 hours. You got it?
Excellent work. You are a fine warrior.
Capture Enemy Documents
Capture enemy documents and bring them to Dushman. The execution time is 12 hours.

Our employer has notified us of the documents to be seized from the enemy. Bring them here, and I'll issue a reward. I'll put a tag on your PDA and don't pull it until it's hidden. Your time is 12 hours, no more.
Good job.
Find %s for Hog
%s are required by Hog to install basic equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
I have a proposition for you. If you can bring me some new tools, you will receive payment. Are you up for it?

Good. I've been looking all over for a {item_name}. It should contain some oil and tools I need to do work on firearms. I will pay you for one of these toolkits if you can bring a full set back to me.
Right, on. This is what I've been looking for, thank!
Find for Hog
%s are required by Hog to install advanced equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
I have another proposition. The toolkit you brought me is working out good, but it doesn't have everything I need. Do you think you can find me a better set?
I need an {item_name}. I'm not sure where you can get one of these, but if you can find one, I need it.
Everything I need is here. Thank you.
Find %s for Hog
%s are required by Hog to install expert equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
I have another proposition. The toolkit you brought me is working out good, but it doesn't have everything I need. Do you think you can find me a better set?
I need an {item_name}. I'm not sure where you can get one of these, but if you can find one, I need it.
Everything I need is here. Thank you.
